TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OAuthWebSecurity extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Manages security that uses OAuth authentication providers like Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Windows Live and OpenID authentication providers like Google and Yahoo.
